verses.roman:
bhaṭṭa kahe,--"e saba vaiṣṇava rahe kon sthāne?
kon prakāre pāimu ihāṅ-sabāra darśane?

synonyms: bhaṭṭa kahe—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa said; e saba vaiṣṇava—all these Vaiṣṇavas; rahe—live; kon sthāne—where; kon prakāre—how; pāimu—shall I attain; ihāṅ-sabāra darśane—seeing all these Vaiṣṇavas.
translation: Vallabha Bhaṭṭa said, "Where do all these Vaiṣṇavas live, and how can I see them?"
